short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Store a list of words and definitions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Word Bay is a browser extension that allows users to save a list of words and definitions. 

Word Bay can be used as a reference tool for writers or as an aid to expand one's vocabulary.

•Core functions•
    ‣Open the word entry form by clicking the right facing arrow.
    ‣Type your word
    ‣Type your definition or click the search icon to auto-fill a definition.
    ‣Click "Save Word" when you are ready to add it to your list.
   ‣ Click the dotted icon that appears in each word container to edit or 
     delete a word or definition.
